entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Agassiz
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:47 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Agassiz 8:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
Temperature: -1.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -1.5°C
Wind: SE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this evening then changing to snow at times heavy this evening. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Risk of hail in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
